name: ColdFusion
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>, Andrew Horton @urbanadventurer
description: Adobe ColdFusion application server and software enables developers to rapidly build, deploy, and maintain robust Internet applications for the enterprise.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<meta name="Author" content="Copyright (\(c\)\ )?[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4} Macromedia( Corp|, Inc)\. All rights reserved\.">)

matches.text: <form name="loginform" action="./enter.cfm" method="POST" onSubmit="cfadminPassword.value = hex_hmac_sha1(salt.value, hex_sha1(cfadminPassword.value));" >
<input name="cfadminPassword" type="Password" size="15" style="width:15em;" class="label" maxlength="100" id="admin_login">
